description: '''Garifuna music''' is an ethnic music and dance with African, [[Arawak]], and [[Kalinago]] elements, originating with the Afro-Indigenous [[Garifuna]] people from [[Central America]] and [[Saint Vincent and the Grenadines]]. In 2001, Garifuna music, dance, and language were collectively proclaimed as a [[Masterpiece of the Oral and Intangible Heritage of Humanity]] by [[UNESCO]].
